description: Treat the family with this easy five-ingredient peri peri chicken wings recipe. Slow cooked for extra tenderness, they're best served with a lemon mayo.
name: SlowCooker 5Ingredient Peri-Peri Chicken Wings Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Combine mayonnaise, zest and lemon juice in a small bowl. Season. Place chicken in a serving dish. Drizzle over sauce and toss gently to combine. Sprinkle with green onion. Serve with lemon mayonnaise.
